sentences.sContent: Several senators introduced legislation aimed at sexual harassment.
sentences.sCn: 几位参议员提交了针对性骚扰的立法议案。

sentences.sContent: ...Why did white settlers introduce alcohol to Indians...
...which is planning to introduce a new program of longer adventure trips...
...That is not surprising: politicians with an eye on the next election will hardly rush to introduce unpopular measures that may not bear fruit for years...
...decided to introduce support for remote working at the same time...

words.tran: 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

trans.tranOther: to formally present a possible new law to be discussed
